article_metadata.article_headline: Manchester United's new formation may have to "evolve into something else"
article_metadata.article_text:
**_Chelsea and Arsenal will have to pay £115m to sign Newcastle United's Alexander Isak, Hamburg consider appointing Ruud van Nistelrooy as their new manager, Jose Mourinho dismisses Fenerbahce links to Cristiano Ronaldo._**

**Chelsea** have joined **Arsenal** in the race for Alexander Isak - but **Newcastle United** will demand at least £115m for their 25-year-old Swedish striker. [(Teamtalk), external](https://www.teamtalk.com/chelsea/newcastle-name-their-price-alexander-isak-chelsea-join-arsenal-race-for-sublime-striker)

**Aston Villa, AC Milan** and **Juventus** will battle it out with **Arsenal** for **Real Madrid** forward Arda Guler, 19, with the Spanish club now understood to be open to letting the Turkey international leave on loan. [(Caughtoffside), external](https://www.caughtoffside.com/2024/11/24/arda-guler-transfer-arsenal/)

German club **Hamburg** are considering appointing former Manchester United interim boss Ruud van Nistelrooy as their new manager after they parted company with Steffen Baumgart. [(Sky Sports Germany), external](https://sport.sky.de/transfer/news/34132/13260232/hsv-denkt-an-ruud-van-nistelrooy-als-baumgart-nachfolger)

**Fenerbahce** boss Jose Mourinho has dismissed speculation about the Turkish club making a move for 39-year-old **Al-Nassr** and Portugal forward Cristiano Ronaldo. [(Goal), external](https://www.goal.com/en/lists/jose-mourinho-responds-ridiculous-reports-cristiano-ronaldo-reunion-fenerbahce-saudi-nightmare-al-nassr/blt54d1d0ed50309d14)

**Lille** and England midfielder Angel Gomes, 24, is set for a return to **Manchester United** after new manager Ruben Amorim gave the club the green light to re-sign him. [(Caughtoffside), external](https://www.caughtoffside.com/2024/11/24/angel-gomes-transfer-man-united/)

**Nottingham Forest** are in advanced discussions with full-back Ola Aina over a new contract. The 28-year-old Nigeria international's current deal runs out in the summer, meaning he will be free to negotiate with overseas clubs from January. [(Athletic - subscription required), external](https://www.nytimes.com/athletic/5943480/2024/11/24/ola-aina-new-nottingham-forest-contract/?source=emp_shared_article)

**Crystal Palace** manager Oliver Glasner will be backed heavily in the January transfer market as the Austrian bids to bolster his relegation-threatened squad. [(Football Insider), external](https://www.footballinsider247.com/crystal-palaces-january-transfer-plan-revealed-orourke/)

**Real Sociedad** feel powerless to stop Spain international Martin Zubimendi, 25, from leaving the club, with **Arsenal** and **Liverpool** both eager to sign the holding midfielder, who is rated at 60m euros (£49.9m). [(Todofichajes - in Spanish), external](https://todofichajes.com/zubimendi-apunta-a-salir-en-enero/)

Wayne Rooney is planning to make a move for **Liverpool's** English striker Jayden Danns, 18, to bolster his attacking options at **Plymouth.** [(Sun), external](https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/31901553/man-utd-wayne-rooney-liverpool-transfer-jayden-danns/)

**Newcastle** boss Eddie Howe and sporting director Paul Mitchell have held initial talks with the club's Saudi Arabian owners to discuss their plans for the January transfer market when Slovakia keeper Martin Dubravka, 35, could leave. [(Chronicle), external](https://www.chroniclelive.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/newcastle-united-firm-up-transfer-30436400)

**Manchester City** are interested in **Bournemouth** centre-back Illia Zabarnyi and the Cherries could sell the 22-year-old Ukraine international in the summer to raise funds. [(Football Insider), external](https://www.footballinsider247.com/bournemouth-will-accept-man-city-offer-for-ilya-zabarnyi-sources/)

1.  **Simon Stone**  
    Chief football news reporter
    
    New Manchester United coach Ruben Amorim has an unusual way of singling out players when he is making generic points.
    
    He did it on Sunday when he spoke about his players having difficulties adapting to his new system, pointing to an instance when Jonny Evans found himself in the wrong place.
    
    Today in his news conference, Amorim explained he was using Evans to emphasise the point he was making rather than being critical.
    
    A couple of answers later, he was talking about players needing to score goals and said Amad Diallo needs to be better at it.
    
    "You always have to adapt to different ideas and positions, even sometimes playing in the same system you have to adapt to different ideas of playing," said Fernandes before Thursday's Europa League game against Norwegian champions Bodo/Glimt.
    
    ....
    
    Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana has been given the Player Impact Award by international players' union Fifpro for his charity work.
    
    Onana set up the Andre Onana Foundation to provide free medical care and surgeries for underprivileged children and adults in Cameroon and other countries in sub-Saharan Africa.
    
    Doctors have performed more than 1,200 operations in the past three years.
    
    Onana, 28, said he felt "a responsibility to give back and help others".
    
    "When I passed through Barcelona, Amsterdam and Milan on my way to Manchester United, I had people who helped me on that journey," he said.
    
    "When I was down, they gave me a hand so that I could stand up. I’ve never forgotten the help I received."
    
    Manchester United's new formation may have to "evolve into something else" if they are going to be competitive in the Premier League, says former Liverpool midfielder Danny Murphy.

quotes.raw_quote_text: You always have to adapt to different ideas and positions, even sometimes playing in the same system you have to adapt to different ideas of playing.
quotes.summary: I must adapt to different ideas and positions in the system.

quotes.raw_quote_text: I feel a responsibility to give back and help others. When I passed through Barcelona, Amsterdam and Milan on my way to Manchester United, I had people who helped me on that journey. When I was down, they gave me a hand so that I could stand up. I’ve never forgotten the help I received.
quotes.summary: I feel responsible to give back, remembering the help I received on my journey.

quotes.raw_quote_text: Manchester United's new formation may have to evolve into something else if they are going to be competitive in the Premier League.
quotes.summary: The new formation needs to evolve to stay competitive in the league.
